A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie was a good movie if you know nothing about Star Wars. It got everything wrong about the New Republic and Luke Skywalker. In the last movie\, The Force Awakens\, the New Republic was destroyed. According to the Star Wars book timeline\, Luke would've been 44 years old when that happened. Disney absolutely ruined Star Wars by buying it. They should remake both movies\, reading all of the books\, and following all of the facts.
